website_summaries.verdict: With a long list of features, the DuoDiner is convenient and comfortable for infants and toddlers.
pros: The one-hand removable tray is big, which limits the amount of food that falls on the floor
A dishwasher-safe tray insert makes it easy to clean
Height and recline options work well for babies first learning to sit up and toddlers
cons: The seat pad and straps are hard to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair! Very pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality high chair. We just started using this high chair for our 6 months old baby boy and he loves sitting on this chair .very comfortable and great quality. We had little difficulty assembling this chair while putting 2 pins underneath the seat part but once its done its beautiful and comfortable high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzail U. Haq

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and go with
customer_reviews.text: I was a little confused by the picture and didn't realize the pattern was added padding for a smaller baby. Without it the chair is a dark gray and teal, which I am okay with. It was easy to put together, it has three settings for reclining to sitting up, and it's easy to travel with. We took the booster part off to bring to someone else's house for dinner and it was easy. The straps that connect to the chair are tucked away in its own compartment for easy storing. The pad itself seems to be made out of vinyl which makes it really easy to wipe clean after a messy mealtime.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Seat belt straps are woefully too short
customer_reviews.text: The features of this high chair are nice but the straps for belting in the child are way too short and wont fit over my granddaughters stomach, and she is not even 6 months old. Too bad because it otherwise seems like a good high chair
customer_reviews.author: D. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Love this highchair!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, wide tray so food doesn't go all over the place (see one of my disappointed golden retrievers waiting in vain for falling food), easy to move, one-handed tray release . . . I could go on, but I like everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Two things I dislike....
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the seat cover. The material feels weird. It doesn’t seem great for cleaning either. I also don’t like the way the tray arms are plastic and sliding onto plastic. I prefer the old fashioned metal kind. Other than those two things, the chair is good so far. My 7 month old grandson loves it. I like the harness—they only had lap belts back when my children were little. My son and daughter in law got the more expensive Graco high chair (Blossom?). I love the leatherette seat pad and the metal tray arms that slide into slots. Much, much better quality. Of course they paid more than twice as much as this one cost.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I ended up just leaving the cover off because it collects food in the creases... now I just wipe off the plastic seat in seconds after he’s done. I also love that I can take the straps off and throw them in the washer. We recently moved the seat into a dining room chair so he could be more of a part of meal time. We love it, but I wish the base had a wheel lock. If we put him close to the table while the seat was in the base, he would push away and go rolling across the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny X.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this chair! Finally I can feed my baby comfortable for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Excited to have this highchair
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for this highchair. I watch my granddaughter and soon to be newborn GD...I had an older one that was a trial to use. My daughter had this one and I loved the way she could take it apart EASILY and use as a booster or even to just sit and watch tv. With the next one coming I knew I had to get this!!! It was easy to put together and it is easy to use!! LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses with this chair. Great for all baby meals.
customer_reviews.text: As a busy mom feeding has to be fast and easy. This product is great. I have a high top table so I can remove the tray just buckle her in and wheel her right up to the table to eat dinner with the family. The removable seat is also amazing. When I detach it I can place it on the living room floor with some snacks while she watches her favorite show. I don’t have to worry about her taking her snacks and leaving a trail around the house. Really enjoy having this product. The multiple use of it is my favorite feature.
customer_reviews.author: LHSTX95

customer_reviews.title: great high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair so much more than the one I previously had. I had a little trouble with one step of the assembly, but all in all it took about 30 minutes to put together. The only caution I would give is that this high chair is big. It doesn't easily tuck into a corner, and even though it has the wheels, I found it difficult to maneuver in my house from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Church

customer_reviews.title: Love it all except the buckle
customer_reviews.text: We are grandparents and got this to have when our grandson comes to visit. We are not fans of the straps. It takes us a long time to get him buckled in. We are nearing 50 so we are young grandparents but I think that whole buckle system could use a redesign. Otherwise the chair is great. It tilts so he has grown in it. Everything is wipeable which I love. It meets our needs but the buckle has to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Three

customer_reviews.title: Perfect highchair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best highchair! It does everything I need it to. It has wheels, two trays (that are dishwasher safe) the backing of the chair reclines, it’s such a pretty chair and it’s easy to clean... AND super affordable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Wanted something inexpensive for my second home. Assembly was fairly easy except for the metal rods were very difficult to insert under the seat. I had to use a butter knife handle to push the metal in. Pros -inexpensive -removable seat cover -foldable does storage Cons -seat cushion fabric feels cheap -bulky overall -wheels don’t lock Would recommend if you don’t feel like spending a lot on a chair. If you can raise your budget, I definitely prefer our Stokke Tripp Trapp at our regular home.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it yet...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for 2 weeks. I dislike that it has wheels but nothing to block them! So, sometimes you try to take the baby out and it moves along with you, not making it easy to operate. The tray doesn’t seem super safe to me. It seems to be in place but if you pull hard while testing comes out 😒 It is easy to clean, that is true. We were considering another option. I sort of regret getting this one, we choose because of so many ratings...
customer_reviews.author: gemma

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful High Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. It's smooth rolling on the floor. It has nice padding for infant. It converts to toddler chair too. I just happened to find this on sale through Amazon. A great buy! I highly recommend this high chair. I am a Prime Member. I ordered it early Wednesday morning, and much to my happy surprise, received it the next day! Great job Amazon. $48 off original price too! I got a great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read directions thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: I gave “easy to assemble” 4 stars because of the rods. Maybe it’s just us, but it is worth saving someone else the annoyance. There are 2 little metal rods that go under the seat. PUT THOSE IN AFTER YOU PUT THE BACK ON TO THE BOOSTER SEAT. Lol. Because once those rods are in...they are IN. Other than that, great product for the price. Less expensive than most and quite comparable to the $150 one I was looking at. Also, it’s nice that there’s a liner that is easily removed and reattached to the tray.
customer_reviews.author: William zambarano

customer_reviews.title: Durable and versatile high chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this high chair for my active 10-month-old son, and it keeps him in place the entire meal time. Sturdy chair but not taking up too much space. What I like most abt the product is its huge tray, although wish the cup holder would be a bit deeper. Overrall, super happy about it and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Quynh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Finally. A good high chair. Easy to put together. Sturdy. It is rather large, but I like that. Still small enough to store. We live in an apartment so I wanted something that was sturdy and can be stored easily. Well. Found it! Best 80 bucks I've spent. Baby will fit in it a long time. I love the straps. It holds my 5 month old in place so he isn't flying all over the place while eating. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hood

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom, I researched MANY high chairs before settling on this one. The seat cover is a very easy to clean material and I love the 5 point harness; it is very secure and I feel confident strapping my baby in. He is 3 months old and enjoys sitting in the infant recline position while I wash dishes, cook, etc. I’m sure he will enjoy it even more when we start using the tray with real food. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know life could be this way. I had so much trouble feeding my son before I bought this. Now it is a breeze multitasking while he eats. It was pretty easy to put together and you can move it around effortlessly with the attached wheels. Two things I don't like: The wheels don't lock, so I will find my son rolling the chair around the floor and it kind of hard to clean fully. No biggie though. I DEFINITELY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair and I love Graco. Graco is my favorite brand to buy for my baby it’s very easy to set up and use. I trust all of their products and I went ahead and got this for him. It’s three stages so I was able to use it when he was 3 months without hurting him back since it reclines back like a car seat. Now we use it like a regular high chair but we’ll be able to attack it to any chair when we need a booster which is great because of the added safety.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: I hate how difficult it is putting the tray on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate how difficult it is putting the tray on the chair, are they all this difficult??? This is my first child, I wouldn't know. It's a beautiful and comfortable chair but it's not practical. I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Areli Robles

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!  Moves around!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great product, but chair wheels around and moves with almost no pressure! I'm returning immediately. My 20 pound Boston Terrier was able to move this thing by bumping into it (with baby inside). Why not have locking wheels?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair now for about 5 months and my only complaint thus far is the shoulder strap harness. They were such a pain when trying to strap my son into the chair that I decided to just remove them, along with the back pillow and now just strap him in at the waist. The tray is nice an big and provides lots of space for food, toys or whatever your needs may be. The reclining positions are great - for a while it was the only way my son would take his bottle.
customer_reviews.author: GinaMT

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase and Very Durable...
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this high chair EXCEPT the wheels don’t lock. It’s not a big deal for our 5 1/2 month old granddaughter but it would be nice to have. This is great for chunky babies because our granddaughter is 17 lbs and 26.5” long and definitely has lots of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not given full description in product profile
customer_reviews.text: "Open Box - Very Good Small cosmetic imperfection on top, front or sides of item. Item will come in original packaging. Packaging will be damaged." The product we received was an open box. However, it was used. In the description it said nothing about this having been a used product. My one-star rating applies to the lack of disclosure regarding the quality of the product we received, not the function or use of the product. The misleading description of the product resulted in receiving an item that someone had used, then left food on it! Then presumably disassembled it, and then returned it. Buyer be wary.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Linfesty

customer_reviews.title: So far, a great High Chair
customer_reviews.text: Really like this High Chair as it is sturdy, has a good size but not too high, and large serving tray. Only wish the wheels were in back instead of the front, but that is a minor inconvenience and doesn't take much away from the great build and overall design of this Graco DuoDiner LX High Chair. (Funny - the name almost sounds like it's a car with the "LX" designation) Either way, it's a great product at a great price - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: My son still hasn’t used this high chair yet due to not being able to put it together. We assembled everything then next thing you know it fell apart with one move. Literally.. seat fell off everything went on the floor like wow lol all that work and it fell. It comes with 2 little skinny rods that hold the back part of the chair in place and it wouldn’t even connect like the rods weren’t long enough; probably why it all came apart. The foot rest also wouldn’t connect there’s no where for it to snap in.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beam

customer_reviews.title: Looks different than produce photo
customer_reviews.text: The back material is shiny black, NOT a matte gray. I am bummed about that and will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this high chair for my baby that is still learning to sit and loves to join us for dinner. I didnt want to hold the baby while eating. This chair has been amazing he loves it. Plus once he is eating solid food he already loves the chair so he will really love it then not to mention the fact that it is a 6 in 1 so it can be a booster seat and so much more. It reclines to different levels so he can be comfortable. We will definitely get way more use out of it versus just a regular highchair.
customer_reviews.author: amers!

customer_reviews.title: Review.
customer_reviews.text: This was kind of annoying to assemble, but I got it. You can adjust the seat back or forward which is helpful. You can also adjust the table forward and back which is also helpful so your baby doesn't climb out and hurt themselves. There's straps in the seat for extra security. Very easy to move around the room and very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Look no more
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. It is exactly what we needed. I love you can modify the height that you want the chair. That there is a tray on top of the original tray that you can take out easily to clean. The fabric of the chair is not really soft soft but its soft enough for my little one. The fabric is made for easy clean up. My little one has spilled squash all over this thing and I wipedoff easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a handful of features that this chair ended up having; wipe clean fabric, foldable base, converts to booster, on wheels. Only thing I'd change is wheels on all legs instead of just the front two.
customer_reviews.author: hdr

customer_reviews.title: Well made!! Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I did it while cooking dinner!! More importantly, it’s extremely sturdy and well made! I love that the top of the tray comes off, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Cari More

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Safe for my child, great safety straps and easy on and off tray with a large button on the front of the tray (graco logo). Wheels are great and make this high chair easy to move and safe to move with child in the chair. Easy to clean and a complete lifesaver to keep child up at my level so she can watch and see me while multitasking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Seat pins installing is nuts
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely hard to do one part of the the seat. The pins. I bought this highchair for my grandbabies when they visit. It's a great highchair, except the illustrations on the pins , & how hard they are to install. I would give 5 stars except having the pin problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble. Someone had mentioned that the back support falls off when child leans back on it, but that may be because he/she didn't install the 2 rods as noted in the instructions. This high chair is very sturdy and easy to clean because of the type of material the seat cushion is made of. You can easily wipe off or remove completely to do a detailed cleaning. I feel the only inconvenience I can think of is that I need to install my own felt pads to on the back support "legs" from scratching my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tsutsui

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this high chair and my 3 month old does too! Its easy to assemble and easy to use when I only have one arm available when holding my son. My son isn't at the age where I can feed him solid foods yet, but I still sit him in it and roll him around the house where he could see me whenever I'm doing chores.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Perea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful High Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Hubs put together in about 20-30 minutes. Beautiful high chair! Easy to adjust height. Glides beautifully over our tile kitchen floor. Not too much use yet, as the baby is just beginning solid foods. So far, it’s been easy to wipe up any spills or messes. Tray insert washes easily. Straps hold little guy very securely, and it appears to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a little pricey for the product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wanted a black or gray high chair. The color did not disappoint, however, the baby insert doesn’t attach to the high chair cover so it flops. Also, the buckle needs some serious work. You have to connect all 4 straps and the buckle to actually buckle it. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Queen

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: These are cute chairs but for being Graco, I expected a lot more. We ordered two and putting the seat part together with the pins was a nightmare. Absolutely horrible design. My fingers still hurt from trying to put the pins in. On the bright side- fabric is pretty easy to wipe down, the straps are black which is a huge plus and the adjustable height is great! They are pretty heavy, so also keep that in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great for my child
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only chair we've used since our child was born. She is now a toddler and it still fits her well. The straps take a bit of time to locate and snap with a struggling baby but this I think is part of parenting and all baby chairs. Still in great shape after two years. We would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RW Powers

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair & so does my baby!! The seat cushion is super easy to clean, but the tray is a bit too big to easily clean in my sink (which I don’t mind). I love the fact that this high chair has wheels making it easier to maneuver. I have tile floors, so I’m not sure how easily it’ll glide on carpet. It is a bit bulky, so if space is your concern I wouldn’t recommend. Other than that it was an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Tray very difficult to slide on
customer_reviews.text: We just received this and assembled it. My husband put it together fairly quickly. He said that the step with the pins was hard to figure out from the picture, but once he realized what the arrows were pointing at it wasn't hard to do. I rated it 3 stars because the tray is very hard to get onto the highchair. I'm hoping this will get easier with time as I don't have the time or energy to return it for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair.
customer_reviews.text: I have three kiddos and I’ve never owned a high chair until now. I love it. This high chair is SO easy to put together, it’s super easy to clean and baby loves sitting up in his chair. I love that it disassembles into a booster seat too. It’s very easy to love around and to buckle and unbuckle baby.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Such a safe chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this chair!! As we all know, moms can get distracted for a split second and I did as I was removing my LO. If it wasn’t for the tray locking itself back in place, my LO could have fell out!! I still cannot believe it locked into place and I’m so thankful for that small feature. Super safe chair! Love how it adjusts and reclines! My LO is small and it’s the only chair I’ve found to allow her to reach the tray. She loves the chair and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable, and safe.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a comfortable high chair and keeps my baby safe while she’s in it. This color was cheaper than the other models just like it simply because of the color I assume. Needless to say, great high chair and does what I need it to do: keep my baby safe while I feed her.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Royal

customer_reviews.title: Skcrews
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble,followed along to the you tube video, but when I put the screws in they did not slide as easily as the video they only went in 3/4 of the way so I just left it, I might use a hammer not sure, I like the way they chair reclines n the wheels on it makes it east to move
customer_reviews.author: alma garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy high chair
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my son then my niece when I had her and it’s a good sturdy high chair I recommend it. I just wish the makers would think about the cleaning process for the parents. The fabric was easy to clean yes but there’s so many seams and crevices so it was a bit annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding a highchair. Most of them look boring or are super expensive and its hard to find a cute pattern.This one is really nice..love the colors on it. I wanted a chair with wheels but i really wish it had breaks too for when you put the baby in it. Also be carefull when sliding on the tray.my baby's finger got caught in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nad Ine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair was extremely easy to assemble, and it can be used as a booster seat too! I was looking for something with a removable tray cover, and this high chair has that as well. Very easy to move, also. I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old has used this since the age of 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable for baby and toddler. We have been using this highchair since my son was 4 months old and he is now 2. I like all the padding it comes with and it is removable and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair I love how versatile it is and that I can use it at different levels depending on where I’m sitting and that it comes off it’s feet so I can sit on the livingroom floor and feed him. It’s a great highchair and we love it. It goes in into a booster once he’s bigger. Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Haack

customer_reviews.title: Love this highchair!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product on the open box like new. Everything was still in the plastic wrapping, the only thing was the box was damaged alittle. I got this for 86 bucks instead of paying 126 dollars. I love the highchair. Great quality! So much better then the first Graco I got from Walmart that was 100 bucks and not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good looks with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Chair was bought for its looks but has some serious issues with weak overall structure. It basically wiggles all the time, with no ability to tighten it up. Otherwise easy to clean with its removable seat cover and two stage tray.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love this. My only complaint is that the straps are pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: So versatile I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is portable and easy to take apart or position where it’s needed. I hate the fact the wheels don’t really work it’s like I have to drag it across the floor. I also wish it would collapse for slimmer storage. Storage isn’t really that important so it’s versatility was a huge benefit.
customer_reviews.author: kgarner

customer_reviews.title: The chair that saved my husbands life
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was in desperate need for the worlds best high chair and hot damn, did I score biggy biggy. I’ve literally never never not ever been not unhappier with a product on amazon since I visited this river. The locals are what make this tourist destination worth the trip. My husband almost got eaten by a whole crocodile, creyecky now that’s a crondiddlyonks awesome pants. Did I tell you about the pants I bought too? Wow
customer_reviews.author: Kari O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many high chair reviews and trying to find the best high chair to clean I found this one. The cover can be removed to wash and clean under the cover but you can also just wipe the cover down with a wet wipe. I’ve had spots that I missed and the next day I was still able to wipe off easily. The straps are also easy to clean but you may want to tackle those right away but if you can’t they still are easy to clean the next day.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter has PWS, and this highchair means that she can eat more upright and feel more secure. I love the design, I love the fact that it arrived a day early. This has been a great gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Ray

customer_reviews.title: Really useful high chair
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a visit from our 19 month old grandson. It's an excellent high chair. The chair is easily removed from its legs and is stable on regular chairs, making it simpler to feed an energetic toddler at friends or restaurants without the burden of moving the entire chair. It is large which limits its maneuverability but helps contain the mess of a small child's meal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan - very plasticky and you need two hands to do the 5 point harness because the shoulder strap doesn't stay on the link as soon as you release the lap band the straps separate- this is hard with a wiggling baby!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Buttigieg

customer_reviews.title: Mom friendly when you only have one hand free
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs this. It moves easy the tray can be removed with one hand and it’s adjustable. You can also take the seat out to set it in a chair. The back reclines if need too. Best thing I purchased for my little one
customer_reviews.author: Brad Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 4 months old and we love this highchair. It sits him up for when he try's solids and reclines when he wants a bottle. This product was so easy to assemble I almost didnt need the instructions. Even though the wheels only move front to back the chair is still very easy to move around. I definitely recommend this highchair and for the price you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah89

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is easy to assemble/disassemble. I really like the top of the table coming off. It makes it easier to clean. They clearly chose seat material that’s easy to clean. It’s a good height. I appreciate the two wheels. It doesn’t just slide around with him in it, but I can pull the chair to me or into the table without having to pick it up. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall parents and active toddlers
customer_reviews.text: What a durable highchair at a killer price! The tray is huge! It serves as a great surface to play, color, and is perfect for our energetic, hungry boy! I'm glad I purchased a dark color as it hides stains well. The material is easy to clean, but the buckles are narrow and collect food pieces easily. I have had that issue with every highchair. My favorite feature is the product height. My husband is 6'5 and does not have to bend nearly as much to feed the little guy. I wouldn't consider it compact in any way, but very sturdy and rolls well for mobility.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Price not justified
customer_reviews.text: I like this one but not quite pleased with the price I pay. You have to be very careful while locking the tray. My daughter fingers were hurt while i try to lock the tray. Be careful when u use it.
customer_reviews.author: Npl_USA_2008

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble. Directions unclear.
customer_reviews.text: The directions for attaching the seat by inserting the pins were totally unclear. I tried to find a YouTube for assembling this but it was not very helpful. They could have sent that part already assembled. If the pins have to be removed to use it in other positions I will be forced to return it. It also fell on my foot and bruised my foot while I was removing it from the box. All in all an extremely unpleasant experience. Nothing like other Graco high chairs I have purchased. Good luck if you but this.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite highchair
customer_reviews.text: 4th baby...favorite highchair. I really like that it's not loud colors. The sleek blacknlook just looks really sharp. Looks comfy..doesn't take up as much room as it could....easy enough to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: These are good high chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this highchair. So far, 2 for myself and another for a gift. The only improvement I can see would be to come up with another kind of strap material that would be easy to clean. Maybe a plastic or silicone covered strap that could wipe off instead of having to remove and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair
customer_reviews.text: We have a year old Granddaughter and this is the perfect chair. I love that the tray has a topper that pops out easily for cleaning. This chair was a breeze to put together and has plenty of great features. It adjusts in multiple ways also. every thing is easily removable for easy cleaning. It also folds up for easy storage. Very sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: MHalf22

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect! Best high chair money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I use it to feed my spawns. This is the second one I own... its comes off the legs if you want to set them on the floor ir a chair legs can get tall or short Its perfect. SO perfect I bought it 2 times. I bought one for my toddler when he was a baby and again for my new baby
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Grows with child
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas gift and Dad put it right together, seemed to roll well and went together easy. I loved how it grew with the child, I considered ordering one for my daughter LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Item was advertised as new
customer_reviews.text: Item was advertised as new, but box was re-sealed, seemed to be a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McNellis

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the metropolis color and was disappointed to see that the item in picture doesn't match the one received. The item in person isn't matte black but has a strong shine to it. The build quality feels fine though
customer_reviews.author: J. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Easy to clean and operate. We leave it out 24/7 and it doesn't take up a ton of room. It's very manageable. Very sturdy and seems comfy to our little guy. Great chair!
customer_reviews.author: jim kenney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this highchair! My son has to get a few meds each day and the multiple reclining positions makes it easier to give them. The tray is super easy to take apart and wash and the material is easy to wipe clean so I don't have to constantly wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Parlormaster

customer_reviews.title: Leg design is sturdy and stable but takes up more floor space than ...
customer_reviews.text: One handed tray release is not all it's cracked up to be. I am a smaller woman and can't line up the tray with one hand and grip the release lever at the same time while holding baby. Two handed operation works ok with only a moderate amount of mumbled curses. Leg design is sturdy and stable but takes up more floor space than expected. When folded up, still very awkward. Padding on chair does clean easily. Strap system is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrakantha

customer_reviews.title: Best high chair
customer_reviews.text: Best high chair we’ve had. Super easy to clean. The only negative is that it’s hard to store. It’s still pretty bulky when it’s folded, otherwise, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aerial Williams

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves his highchair !
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It's easy to move around and to detach if you need to take it with you although the chair part itself is a big bulky. It's very easy to clean and remove trays. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an easy to use , easy to clean high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and compact
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble.. They’re plenty of videos also to watch... compact doesn’t take a lot of room... easy to switch heights tho I wish it could go a lil higher... nice compartment in the back but if u have a bag of wipes in the back u can’t really lay the baby back...the middle piece of the tray is a bit bothersome for my son... the tray is one handed..other than that the cover is easy to wipe food off. Easy and compact product
customer_reviews.author: viviana

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second high chair of the same model. Totally does the job. The different settings are great for growing babies. A little bulky so not recommended for smaller places.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: not impressed buy the seat material
customer_reviews.text: the cloth cushion is almost useless, doesn't really provide nay comfort, instead food gets all over it (baby led weaning) and it drove me crazy washing it every day, I ended up removing the cloth cushion. the main seat cover is just a cheap material. I wish I had seen the product in person before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: vaibhav kachare

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to child
customer_reviews.text: I thought this chair would be really good but it’s ergonomics aren’t ideal. The bar between the legs is too big and you can’t take it out. Other chairs are much more comfortable for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. It’s so easy to put together and the baby loves being our height at the table. I highly recommend this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: cherylemf

customer_reviews.title: The adjustment for the baby back support is cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment for the baby back support is cheap and flimsy, make sure to securely relatch it once you move it or the entire back falls off and your baby can fall backwards from high up. Luckily I was still behind my 9 month old when this happened and I caught him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn’t love the leather type material
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t love the leather type material. But it has grown on me. My son likes to be present at the table while we eat dinner so for my son it was perfect for him to sit in and be supported. (3 months at the time of purchase) My 1 year old niece has used it, eating a very colorful cake. It cleaned up my easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amber & Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love the high chair
customer_reviews.text: The set up was super easy for the high chair. I love that It converts. However it won’t fit our table when it’s sitting on a chair since we have an oddly shaped table
customer_reviews.author: victor sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bret Michaels of high chairs
customer_reviews.text: As a dad with 4 boys this chair rocks. Its the Bret Michaels of high chairs. lol. Multi settings easy to use folds for storage top comes off tray for super easy washing. exactly what he needs. Great product
customer_reviews.author: A. Mushala

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: great fit for infant to growing toddler. easy to clean. love the pocket in the back to store bibs to have at hand. very sturdy and easy to roll around where needed.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Works great, wish the seat folded and wasnt so top heavy with folded and seat attached
customer_reviews.text: Awesome high chair with alot of great features, only wish it could stand folded with the seat on it but the seat makes it somewhat top heavy. Wish the seat folded as well so it would take up a little less space. Other than that it works and functions great. Really easy to use and highly adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair, just wish it had locks on the wheels
customer_reviews.text: I found it very easy to put this high chair together and also to use it. I only wish it had locking wheels to help keep it in place while putting on the tray table, it is my only complaint. I brace it with my foot but locks would be a simple solution in future models.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. My son is 7 months old and he's gonna have this for a very very long time. It's very sturdy, easy to assemble. I literally have nothing negative to say about this item
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair but set up is not easy
customer_reviews.text: It is a great highchair. it moves smoothly. Removing the tray is easy. it can be removed from 2 ways. Putting it together was not a quick setup. there are some pins in the back that are not easy to put in. We had to use a hammer. My highchair's buckle gets stuck. It is very difficult to open it. I bought another highchair (same one) for the babysitter and that buckle works fine. I think i got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made but the cushion is only for the short
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful high chair for the average baby/toddler. The cushion insert only has one set of slits for the shoulder straps so my much taller than average toddler had trouble using it. Other than that one little hiccup it has been good.
customer_reviews.author: MommyD

customer_reviews.title: Scratched out flooring, beware
customer_reviews.text: This high chair end up scratching out LVP flooring as there are only wheel on the front. Just be ware if this will be on a hard surface floor.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Well made baby high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellently made chair that gives baby control of his food, is comfortable yet sturdy, attractive and easy to store. Baby is king of his domain in this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, versatile child care high chair.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile adjustments, comfortable straps, easy to clean materials, removable tray with easy cleaning top and wheels to move where needed. Also the entire seat disconnects from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Scrapes hardwood floor, no back wheels! Dumb design
customer_reviews.text: No Back Wheels! Annoying that this scrapes across the floor. The old model had wheels and the tray was more secure. Its ok, but not great. Update: 5/19. As expected, we have lots of nice scrapes on our hardwood floor. This is the dumbest design, if you like scratched floors this will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this highchair
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair. the infant insert is helpful because my son is only 5 months . the top of the tray snaps right off so you can quickly wash it! and i love the recline feature!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco DuoDiner LX High Chair, Converts to Dining Booster Seat, Metropolis
product_meta.description:
Style:DuoDiner| Color:MetropolisGraco DuoDiner LX Highchair - Metropolis . Introduce your little diner to family mealtimes with our Graco DuoDiner 3-in-1 highchair. The highchair that grows with your child from infant to toddler and converts to a space saving booster. It has a 5-position height adjustment that helps you position baby at the family table. Its 3-position, one-hand adjustable reclining seat and infant head and body support help ensure baby's every meal is a comfortable one. And its the highchair frame is designed to easily stow away when you're using booster mode.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 convertible highchair that grows with your child
Infant highchair reclines to provide a comfortable space for baby
Fully featured toddler booster highchair for your little diner
Easily converts to a booster seat when your child is ready. Wipeable plastic tray, footrest, and frame
Infant head and body support and soft strap covers help keep baby comfortable
Easy clean seat pad is wipeable or machine washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,889 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
